articles.description: Wednesday face off against Cambridge, who have lost their last three games, this weekend away.
articles.content:
Darren Moore's Sheffield Wednesday are set to face off against a "really angry" Cambridge United side when they travel face the U's at the Abbey Stadium this weekend.

articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo dropped iconic celebration due to joke with Man Utd teammates - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester United recorded their fifth victory from six Premier League matches as they ran out 2-1 victors over Everton on Sunday with Cristiano Ronaldo scoring the winner
articles.content:
When Cristiano Ronaldo scored his 700th club career goal against Everton, many expected the Manchester United forward to pull out his trademark 'sui' celebration.
